definition[0]: the way someone is thinking and feeling at a particular time
example[0]: What happened had a lot to do with my state of mind at the time.
example[1]: She returned from lunch in a happier frame of mind.
note[0]: in a good/positive/relaxed etc frame of mind
example[2]: You have to be in the right frame of mind to play well.
note[1]: in the right/wrong frame of mind
